amendatorysection.catchline: Nebraska Fair Employment Practice Act; complaint; applicability.
amendatorysection.para: The Nebraska Equal Opportunity in Education Act does not prohibit a person asserting a claim for discrimination in employment or the conditions thereof from filing a complaint pursuant to the Nebraska Fair Employment Practice Act. Filing a complaint pursuant to the Nebraska Fair Employment Practice Act constitutes a waiver of any right to seek relief pursuant to the Nebraska Equal Opportunity in Education Act, and filing a complaint pursuant to the Nebraska Equal Opportunity in Education Act constitutes a waiver of any right to seek relief pursuant to the Nebraska Fair Employment Practice Act.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Fair Employment Practice Act, see section 48-1125.
